casebody.data:
In re R.H., A Minor Child (DOB: 11-15-99) appealed by Respondent, A.B. No. 55P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. David Childers, Mount Holly, for A.B. Connelia Houston, for Mecklenburg County DSS. Stanley B. Green, Winston-Salem, for Guardian Ad Litem.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th day of January 2005 by Respondent (A.B.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of March 2005."
